timeline.message: :white_check_mark: Fixed updating the cart when sample removed from pipeline.

Merge branch 'development' into remove-irida-cart

# Conflicts:
#	CHANGELOG.md

timeline.bodyText: I see the removeSample function reimplemented, what about the other service functions in here?  I'm assuming they're already done somewhere else?
timeline.author: tom114

replies.bodyText: So the answer to all your questions is that these functions had already been re-written for updates to other features (mostly the new cart).  The only functionality that was really still used was remove sample from cart I just refactored to use the new one.
replies.author: joshsadam

timeline.bodyText: So I'm assuming this is just changing to the cart functions in resources/js/apis/cart/cart.js?
timeline.author: tom114

replies.bodyText: Yes that is all that is happening here.
replies.author: joshsadam

timeline.message:
Merge branch 'development' into remove-irida-cart
